text: Valeriy Yurchuk (; born 12 April 1990 in Dnipropetrovsk, Ukrainian SSR) is a professional Ukrainian football goalkeeper. Yurchuk is a product of the FC Dnipro Youth Sportive School System. His first trainers were Oleksiy Chystyakov and Serhiy Maksymych. He made his debut for Metalurh Zaporizhya in the Ukrainian Premier League in a match against FC Zorya Luhansk on 24 May 2015. ==References == == External links == * * Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Dnipro Category:Ukraine student international footballers Category:FC Dnipro-2 Dnipropetrovsk players Category:FC Dynamo Khmelnytskyi players Category:FC Dnipro Cherkasy players Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya players Category:NK Veres Rivne players Category:FC Naftovyk-Ukrnafta Okhtyrka players Category:SC Dnipro-1 players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Ukrainian Premier League players
title: Valeriy Yurchuk
